item.title: The Business Impact Of Black Friday, Cyber Monday, And The Holiday “Creep”
item.description: The Holiday season seems to start earlier each year. What can businesses do to get ready for Black Friday, Cyber Monday and the Holiday Creep?

item.title: Is Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang The Next Steve Jobs?
item.description: Jensen Huang, the CEO of Nvidia, has the same caliber of vision and energy to drive his company to be like Apple, a multitrillion-dollar company.
